value:
Eeee! I just can't WAIT
to get married!

I'm worried that, when I get married,
Daddy will be all alone... I know! My
husband can live with Daddy and me!

Getting carried away during the
bridal festival is fine, but get some
sleep! Your bloodshot eyes are scary!

A bridal dress! How pretty! I just want
to run around and show it off. Well,
what's stopping me? Off I go!

I'm going to win and nab that bridal
bouquet. I don't understand it, but
I'm gonna do it!

I'm here to share bridal-festival
greetings, compliments of your pal
at $Nf's castle.

Make way! Make waaay! The
beautiful Miss Larum is coming
through!
Umm, beg your pardon?

I just realized I don't care about a
bouquet or whatever. Because I'm
the most stunning flower there is!

Oh no...if I become any cuter,
everyone will be too obsessed to
fight! Wait, maybe that's good...

I'm just so happy to become a bride.
Our love is eternal! Always! Forever!

Hey, I've been thinking about
something! And don't laugh—I'm
really serious about this.$k$pI mean, you only live once, and
youth flashes by in a blink.$k$pSo, well...I've made a decision
about something that is very
important to me.$k$pI want to be with someone who
loves me for me, even when we're
old and wrinkled and gray and—$k$pAnd...why not tell me what you
look for in a partner? If I keep
talking, I'll reveal too much!
やっ
それっ！
きゃあっ
やだっ…！
Love is indestructible!
You do, don't you?
My love is yours!
I'm so happy!
I just hope... Lord Roy...
Hm.
Well, what do you think? About my dress, I mean. It's cute, right?
Oh! Hey, come on. You can't poke me when I'm looking so good!
You think I look pretty? Aww, you're making me blush...but say it again!
Oh, Lord Roy! Don't I make the most perfect bride?
Let me handle the cooking! My father says my food is delicious!
I wonder if Daddy will be happy when I really do become a bride?
You get to escort me! Come on, just take my hand...
Watch this!
Huh?
Make me happy!
